overview: Balam Pardesia is a Bhojpuri film released in 1979, directed by Nazir Hussain. The actors were Rakesh Pandey and Padma Khanna.  The songs of the film were popular even in non-Bhojpuri area. Two famous songs from the film are, "Gorki ptarki re" and "Chadhte Phalgun", both sung by Mohd Rafi. - From wikipedia.
title: Balam Pardesia
